name: Easy Duplicate Woo Order
author: wizbee IT

sections.description:
Easy Duplicate Woo Order allows WooCommerce store admins to duplicate existing orders with just one click quickly. This is particularly useful for creating repeat orders or managing similar orders without having to input each item and customer detail again manually.

Free to use and no premium version

Key Features:

  • One-Click Duplication: Adds a “Duplicate Order” button to the WooCommerce order list table and order edit page.
  • Custom Order Status: Choose the status of the duplicated order from the settings page.
  • Retain Order Details: The duplicated order retains the same products, billing, and shipping details as the original order.
  • Order Notes with Links: Automatically adds order notes to both the original and duplicated orders with links to each other, providing a clear reference between the orders.
  • Translation ready

Why Use Easy Duplicate Woo Order?

Duplicating orders can save time, especially when repeating orders with similar items for the same customer or new customers. Especially when the client calls/messages you and asks to repeat the order.

Enjoying the Plugin?

If you find Easy Duplicate Woo Order helpful, please consider leaving a positive review on WordPress.org. Your feedback helps us improve and reach more users.

For more information, visit our website at Wizbee IT.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Ensure that WooCommerce is installed and activated.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress. If WooCommerce is not active, the plugin will deactivate itself and display an admin notice.
  4. Configure the default order status for duplicated orders by clicking on the “Settings” link from the plugins page or by navigating to WooCommerce > Settings > Duplicate Order.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin work with all versions of WooCommerce?

This plugin is tested with WooCommerce 9.0 and above. We recommend keeping WooCommerce updated for the best compatibility.

Can I choose the status of the duplicated order?

Yes, you can select the desired status of the duplicated order in the plugin settings.

Is the plugin free to use?

Yes, this plugin is 100% free to use. No premium version, subscription bla bla blaâ€¦..

What happens if WooCommerce is not active?

If WooCommerce is not active, the plugin will deactivate itself and display an admin notice. WooCommerce must be installed and active for this plugin to work.
sections.changelog:
2.3.2

  • Fixed plugin activation and deactivation function

2.3.1

  • Fixed some minor issues.

2.3.0

  • Added “Duplicate Order” button to WooCommerce order list.
  • Various improvements.

2.0.0

  • Security update.
  • Compatibility with translation plugins.

1.9.0

  • Added settings page for customizing duplicated order status.

1.3.0

  • Enqueue scripts and styles for a better user experience.
  • Implemented nonce verification for security.
  • Added order notes with links between original and duplicated orders.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Easily duplicate WooCommerce orders with just one click. You can also set duplicated order default status from setting.
